channel.title: Strength lvls and str bonus help
channel.description:
how do i find out/change how much more you can hit per strength lvl and per str bonus.
i would like it to be an aditional 1 number per 4 strength lvls and and additional 1 per 20 str bonus.
i am using a deltascape source.

item.title: Strength lvls and str bonus help
item.dc:creator: @justtesting justtesting
item.description:
@justtesting wrote:

item.cfg is not what he is asking about…
search client.java for maxhit. you should come across an equation for melee, range and mage are seperate but mage just has a max hit set for each spell. you can edit random weapons to increase the spell damage 2 for mod/admin this is evil tho >_>’

Read full topic
item.source: Strength lvls and str bonus help

item.title: Strength lvls and str bonus help
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“njr99, post:1, topic:259464”]how do i find out/change how much more you can hit per strength lvl and per str bonus.

i would like it to be an aditional 1 number per 4 strength lvls and and additional 1 per 20 str bonus.

i am using a deltascape source.[/quote] go into item.cfg search for the item then change the numbers after the those big numbers in the front
